articles.title: Astronaut Samantha Cristoforetti makes history with 1st TikTok from International Space Station - Space.com
articles.description: "Follow me to boldly go where no TikToker has gone before," the European Space Agency astronaut said.
articles.content:
Samantha Cristoforetti has taken TikTok to new heights.
The European Space Agency (ESA) astronaut posted a video to the social media platform from the International Space Station

articles.title: Obesity soars among low-income US children and teenagers during early COVID-19 pandemic - Medical Xpress
